## Meeting.default class

 Meeting is the crux of the plugin   Meeting

|  [updateLLMConnection()](./plugin-meetings.meeting.default.updatellmconnection.md) |  | Connects to low latency mercury and reconnects if the address has changed It will also disconnect if called when the meeting has ended |
|  [updateMedia(options)](./plugin-meetings.meeting.default.updatemedia.md) |  | A confluence of updateAudio, updateVideo, and updateShare this function re-establishes all of the media streams with new options |
|  [updateShare(options)](./plugin-meetings.meeting.default.updateshare.md) |  | <p>Update the share streams, can be used to start sharing</p><p>NOTE: this method can only be used with transcoded meetings, for multistream meetings use publishTrack()</p> |
|  [updateVideo(options)](./plugin-meetings.meeting.default.updatevideo.md) |  | <p>Update the main video track with new parameters</p><p>NOTE: this method can only be used with transcoded meetings, for multistream meetings use publishTrack()</p> |
|  [uploadLogs(options)](./plugin-meetings.meeting.default.uploadlogs.md) |  | Upload logs for the current meeting |
|  [usePhoneAudio(phoneNumber)](./plugin-meetings.meeting.default.usephoneaudio.md) |  | Use phone for meeting audio |
|  [verifyPassword(password, captchaCode)](./plugin-meetings.meeting.default.verifypassword.md) |  | Checks if the supplied password/host key is correct. It returns a promise with information whether the password and captcha code were correct or not. |
